Introduction
This topic contains information on preparing a rating decision involving a claim for benefits under 38 U.S.C. 1151, including
considering direct and presumptive SC in 1151 claims
preparing the rating decision for
1151 grants
, and
1151 denials
assigning an effective date for 1151 compensation
combining the disability ratings of qualifying 1151 disabilities and SC disabilities
possible eligibility for ancillary benefits based on qualifying 1151 disability
, and
ancillary benefits not available by reason of a qualifying 1151 disability
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B
